snippet.title: Sea Monster for the Atari 2600
snippet.description:
This is not bad...but it's definitely not good either.

At the beginning you can't your ship (if you can even call it that), so you have to trigger the joystick forward.

Well, you can move your "ship" while you do it. But that sucks as you can't see your ship.

Another bad thing is that you can shoot only once in a while...well, okay...you can actually shoot more than once in a while. But you shouldn't do that, because if you shoot although you have already, the 2nd shot will destroy your first shot.

But else the game is fun ... and repetitive, lol.
